channel.title: ?making levels go past 99?
channel.description: ok i havent been here in a while because i've been using the search bar like a good boy :D i have tried searching come up with nothing :eek: but howw do you make levels go past 99 :confused:

item.title: ?making levels go past 99?
item.dc:creator: @masseve1 masseve1
item.description:
@masseve1 wrote:

search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0; 
    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;</blockquote>then change the two 99's to whatever you want but they must be the same.for example this is mine <blockquote>public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 152; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 152;</blockquote>

Read full topic
